data.title: Knut HAMSUN Rare Books and First Editions at Bauman Rare Books
data.meta_description: Browse Rare Books and First Editions by Knut HAMSUN available at Bauman Rare Books
data.text:
"ALMOST SINGLE-HANDEDLY CREATED THE MODERN PSYCHOLOGICAL NOVEL"

HAMSUN, Knut. Growth of the Soil. London, 1920.

First edition in English of one of Hamsun's first works to be translated into English—"the novel that earned him the Nobel Prize for literature"— published the same year he won the Nobel, in original cloth. $1150.

Read More

"THERE IS HARDLY A LIVING EUROPEAN EUROPEAN OR AMERICAN WRITER WHO DOES NOT… STAND IN HIS DEBT"

HAMSUN, Knut. Vagabonds. New York, 1930.

First edition in English of the brilliant first novel in the controversial Norwegian writer's "August" trilogy—Hamsun's "magnum opus… an impressive achievement"—in original cloth. $350.

Read More
